app_descript:
Galaxiga Arcade Shooting Game

Brief: Engage in an exhilarating interstellar combat with Galaxiga Arcade Shooting Game, a tribute to the 80s arcade space shooter classics. With a nostalgic pixel graphic style, this mobile game revives the excitement of iconic titles like Galaxia, Galaxian, Galaga, and Galactica, enhanced with modern gameplay. Defend Earth from alien invaders in epic galactic wars, where survival hinges on your ability to upgrade your spaceship and dominate the cosmic battlefield.

Galaxiga Arcade Shooting Game is not just a trip down memory lane; it's a fully-fledged battle for the survival of Earth across the infinite galaxy. Join forces with friends, challenge foes, and remember: your prowess in upgrading and piloting your spaceship can bring peace to the stars above.
